comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: In 1916, a Swede, J.S. Edstrom, was President of the International Amateur Athletic Federation. Might this be him? See NYT of June 10,1916 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9807E7DE173BE633A... He was elected to the office in August 1913. See NYT of Aug 23, 1913 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9501E6DD123FE633A...

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: en.beijing2008.cn/spirit/movement/president/n214044449.shtml has a picture of an older J. Sigfrid Edstrom as President of the International Olympic Committee. Looks like the same guy to me.

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: swanq:  I agree--he does look like the same fellow.  Good sleuthing!  We'll include the fuller info. next time we update.  Thanks.
